channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: BC Today
channel.desc: The show where British Columbians connect on issues facing their lives and their community.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: Alistair Appleton guides a couple who want to switch their lives from the bustle of Bristol to the fresh country air of the Wye Valley on a budget of ?300,000; Alistair discovers the slippery challenges of sustainably sourcing the European eel.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Family Feud Canada
channel.desc: Two families compete to guess the most popular answers to family-friendly survey questions, with a Canadian twist.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Son of a Critch
channel.desc: Mark faces bathroom woes; Fox finds herself parenting her brothers; Poppy Bell visits, and family tensions rise.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Murdoch Mysteries
channel.desc: Murdoch suspects the murder of a fledgling composer may have been motivated by jealousy.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Call the Midwife
channel.desc: Newly qualified midwife Jenny Lee arrives at Nonnatus House, a nursing convent, to begin her new career in the East End of London; Jenny's first assignment is expectant mother Conchita Warren, whose fall has also triggered early labor.
